ValidationRule.description: The passcode can not be just a sub sequence of the access code anchored on the right most digit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Admin API Only", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" , Passcode__c = RIGHT(Name, LEN(Passcode__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Passcode does not meet provisioning requirements. Please revise.
